cab.content: DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY^ S QOVggWMEMT)COPY NO,1-0RE T. 290 (26).CABINET.AFGHANISTAN.The following papers are circulated herewith by-direction of the Prime Minister for consideration by the Cabinet before the Summer Recess.Enclosure 1,A memorandum dated 17th June, 1926, by the Secretary of State for India covering Despatches.(C.I.D. Paper No. 142-D).Enclosure 2.A memorandum dated 12th 3vl1js 1926, by the Secretary of State for India covering Despatches.(C.I.D. Paper No. 144-D).Enclosure 3,A Report by the Chiefs of Staff Sub-Committee ,(CI.D. Paper Ho, 143-D)*20 These papers we?re considered by the Committee of Imperial Defence at their 215th Meeting held on 22nd July,1926. The Minutes of that Meeting, together with a further Report by the Chiefs of Staff Sub-Committee on some of the wider Issues arising out of the discussion which" took place, will be circulated shortly. (CP. 294(26) and CP. 299(26) respectively)(Signed) M.P.A. HANKEY,Secretary, Cabinet.Note. The enclosures referred to above are not;-. - attached in the case of Ministers who""haVealready received them as Members of the Committee of Imperial Defence.-!Whitehall Gardens, S.W.I. 2Sth July, 1926.
